body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Simmons and the customer's name is Betty Edwards.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Gerald Simmons, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Gerald. I'm Betty Edwards. I'm just looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Betty! What type of information are you looking for? We have a wide range of models available.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in something more suitable for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have some excellent touring motorcycles. Can I please have your email address so I can send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's bettyedwards at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Betty. And could you also provide me with your phone number for any follow-up questions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's four zero six, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I’ll make sure to send you some details and follow up soon. Is there anything else you would like to know about our motorcycles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything for now. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Betty. I'm looking forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle. Have a great day!
